amendment.description: To provide additional funding for education for the disadvantaged.

action.text: Amendment SA 1543 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1543 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 330.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1543.
Amendment SA 1543 proposed by Senator Byrd to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S10945-10948, S10952-10957; text: CR S10945) To provide additional funding for education for the disadvantaged.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1543 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 330.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1543 proposed by Senator Byrd to Amendment SA 1542.
